body_html:
I'm having this same problem. I'm compiling 5122250 and now running torch.cuda.init() (or doing cuda operations) results in this error. The strange thing is that the same commit used to work a few weeks ago. I compiled from a fresh clone.
I only have CUDA 8.0 installed.

What can I do?

body:
I'm having this same problem. I'm compiling 51222500e28b49084d77555f63f5a383ddd91b80 and now running `torch.cuda.init()` (or doing cuda operations) results in this error. The strange thing is that the same commit used to work a few weeks ago. I compiled from a fresh clone.
I only have CUDA 8.0 installed.

What can I do?
